programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: As Mac and the team investigate the suspicious death of Dawn's CIA supervisor, the evidence leads to a dirty CIA agent and a massive counterfeiting ring.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Jack attempt to rescue a billionaire's son after he is kidnapped by a former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: While helping a friend in Puerto Rico, MacGyver is taken hostage by robbers who are attempting to steal $2 million from the bank his friend manages.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Mac and Riley are called in to examine a mysterious object that crash-landed in the Nevada desert; Riley uncovers new information about Mac's father but questions whether to deliver it to him after he says he needs to move on.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: MacGyver gets a shocking surprise when he tries to tell Matty he's quitting the Phoenix Foundation.

programme.title: MacGyver
programme.desc: Three months after quitting the Phoenix Foundation and moving to Nigeria, Mac puts aside his differences with his father and returns when he hears Jack is the target of a murderous dictator he double-crossed.

programme.desc: When the boss of Calder's Biscuit Company is murdered in Copenhagen, Barnaby and Nelson join forces with two female Danish detectives.

programme.desc: The Luxton Deeping Crime Festival is jeopardized when a manuscript is stolen and a woman is fatally electrocuted.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Nelson uncover a conflict between the village church and ancient pagan traditions when a pub landlady is crushed to death during a magic show.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby investigates whether a ballad made famous by a late, lamented folk singer could have been the inspiration for a murder.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a wine launch turns deadly, Barnaby tries to find out who is targeting the Midsomer Vinae Winery and what it has to do with the death of a child in a hit-and-run accident.

programme.desc: The team enters the world of master car thieves in order to take down a crooked car dealer.

programme.desc: When small businessmen are blackmailed into committing crimes, the team's investigation reveals an unlikely foe.

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a deadly mine explosion, the team infiltrates the coal mines of West Virginia to stop the dangerous practices of the mine's owner.

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team realizes that they each tried to steal the same artifact on the same night five years ago.

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: The team discovers that an antiquities trafficker is using refugee children to smuggle artifacts; Sophie confronts the consequences of her past.

programme.desc: The team tries to get a violent hedge fund manager to reveal information that could lead to Damien Moreau.

programme.desc: The team takes over a mall on Christmas Eve and uncovers a scheme perpetrated by an old nemesis; Eliot goes undercover as Santa Claus; Parker and Hardison are Santa's helpers.

programme.desc: The team infiltrates a government research lab to stop Damien Moreau from auctioning information to international terrorists.
